posts.post_content:
I am breaking a large group of about 100 or so that I won recently in Legendary. I need about 15 myself, so I am hoping to trade some as well...  send lists to [url]tony@tonyetrade.com[/url] and I will see what I can do...

thanks
Tony
Tony- watch where you post, my friend.....This area is for 19th century and as far as I am aware there weren't Coupons made then.  :)  ....good luck with the sales..
